longMSG:
You are in the KITCHEN on the 1st floor. A tea kettle is squealing.
There is an ISLAND and a PANTRY.
You may go EAST to the DINING ROOM on the 1st floor, or NORTHWEST to the GARDEN.
shortMSG:
You are in the KITCHEN on the 1st floor.
Features: ISLAND, PANTRY
Areas you may go to:
EAST/DINING ROOM
NORTHWEST/GARDEN
